info.title: Yabause
info.author: Yabause Team with...
info.details:
This is unofficial version.
So, you must not ask the Yabause Team about this unofficial Wii version.
Original Source is coded by Yabause Team  at http://www.yabause.org, and modified source includes this file set. 
For more information, see http://wiibrew.org/wiki/Yabause_Wii
(I will update the Wiibrew website. But the site is wiki, anyone 
 can edit it. If I felt inconvenience, I might stop updating.)
